messages.subject: Re: they want to do sch-help
messages.msgSnippet: ... --Just read your post -am wondering how old your girls are? Are they twins? (from your ... They are 10 y/o twins. They decided together to do school
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, M WARDELL <m.wardell499@...> wrote:
--Just read your post -am wondering how old your girls are? Are they twins? (from your
> email address). Have they made this decision together & told you or is it individuals choosing
> the same? Will get back to you a bit later,
> Mariax--

They are 10 y/o twins. They decided together to do "school" although each wanted to do a different subject. They are very, very alike in almost every way, and they have a very close relationship. They prefer to do most everything together.
Bonni

messages.messageBody:
Hi,
 
Just read your post -am wondering how old your girls are? Are they twins? (from your
email address). Have they made this decision together & told you or is it individuals choosing
the same? Will get back to you a bit later,
Mariax
